Question.Subject: Download of movie stopped half way!?
Question.Content: I just downloaded a movie and halfway through the movie just stopped downloading like it was through. The movie doesn't play. Even though I have half of the download it's just useless. Is there any way I can continue the download where I left off.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
you have to start the download again. if you want VLC will let you watch what you did get successfully.
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/download-windows.html

Answer.Content:
you have to start the download again. if you want VLC will let you watch what you did get successfully.
